job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: stronguRole OverviewbrbrustrongAs a Software Engineer youll be working closely with the product management design and engineering staff you are a key technical contributor to the design and assembly of new technology components capabilities and products that grow Finders capabilitiesbrbrA natural problemsolver you will work alongside fellow Engineers your Engineering Lead Principal and Product Manager creating solutions You will act as a force multiplier exemplifying high productivity setting the standard as an inspiration for your team You will champion and embody great software engineering principles to deliver a better experience for our users and an engaging technologyled engineering environment You are hungry and always working on mastery of your craftbrbrstronguMain ResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliContribute to the Finder App and related infrastructure through the duration of sprint cyclesliliContinuously work to iterate and improve code so that its in a better place than it was left previously liliReview code from other team members providing constructive actionable feedback that represents Finders engineering standardsliliPlay a critical role in creating architectural designs and diagrams for future services liliWork with your teammates engaging in discussions around the product development of the Finder App from an engineering lens questioning decisions and providing your viewpoint to improve the overall productliliAttend daily standups biweekly backlog groomings this may vary from team to team retrospectives and other agile rituals brliulstronguEssential Requirements Of The RolebrustrongulliDemonstrable ability to work in a crossdisciplinary delivery team including Software Engineers Product Managers and DesignersliliExperience working across the stack to deliver an outcome including working with NodeJS Typescript React React Native MySQL and GraphQL not all are requiredliliExperience writing wellthought out unit tests in Jest or other that provide coverage in between feature updates and fixesliliExperience working from an MVP through to launch and Scale liliExperience working in a fastpaced energized environment being comfortable with a bit of ambiguity and maintaining a curious attitudeliliExpertise in Agile development methodologiesliliExperience in architectural design including SOA Microservice architectures messaging and event processing liliContinuous integration deployment and delivery practices liliGreat communication and a genuine desire to help the team work better together with a healthy dose of funbrliulstrongNice to havebrstrongulliDevOps and networking experience including monitoring alerting and support liliCryptocurrency passion andor experiencebrliulThis is not a checklist of requirements dont worry if you dont satisfy all wed still love to talkbrbrstronguApplication ProcessbrbrustrongIf this sounds like the kind of opportunity youve been looking for select the Apply Now button below to submit your cover letter and resume Use your cover letter to introduce us to you we want to know who you are what youve worked on and why you think youd be a great addition to the Finder teambrbrstrongInclusionbrbrstrongemTo build technology and products that are used and loved by people and solve realworld problems we need to build a team with many different perspectives and experiences We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company We do not discriminate on the basis of race religion colour national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability status brbrememWe encourage candidates from all backgrounds to apply Applicants in need of special assistance or accommodation during the interview process or in accessing our website may contact us We will treat your request as confidentially as possible In your email please include your name and preferred method of contact and we will respond as soon as possible Email talentfindercom with any questions or feedbackem
